one_to_one_prompts:
|Review of your Personal Development\r
Review of attendance and punctuality.\r
Review your personal development including Skills +.\r
Review your work experience and development of employability skills.\r
Review any support needs.\r
|Review of your Core Qualification(s)\r
Your target grade is...\r
You are currently working at...\r
What actions are you taking to achieve your target grade or further improve  your skills and knowledge?\r

Your target grade is...\r

What actions are you taking to achieve your target grade or further improve your skills and knowledge?"
